chapter.text: 72|1|(he nabee!) kahoh meree or vahyee (prakaashna[1]) kee gayee hai ki dhyaan se suna jinnon ke ek samooh ne. phir kaha ki hamane suna hai ek vichitr quraan.
72|2|jo dikhaata hai seedhee raah, to ham eemaan laaye usapar aur ham kadaapi saajhee nahin banaayenge apane paalanahaar ke saath kisee ko.
72|3|tatha nihsandeh mahaan hai hamaare paalanahaar kee mahima, nahin banaee hai usane koee sanginee (patnee) aur na koee santaan.
72|4|tatha nishchay ham agyaan mein kah rahe the allaah ke sambandh mein jhoothee baaten.
72|5|aur ye ki hamane samajha ki manushy tatha jinn nahin bol sakate allaah par koee jhooth baat.
72|6|aur vaastavikta ye hai ki manushy mein se kuchh log, sharan maangate the jinnon mein se kuchh logon kee, to unhonne adhik kar diya unake garv ko.
72|7|aur ye ki manushyon ne bhee vahee samajha, jo tumane anumaan lagaaya ki kabhee allaah phir jeevit nahin karega, kisee ko.
72|8|tatha hamane sparsh kiya aakaash ko, to paaya ki bhar diya gaya hai prahariyon tatha ulkaon se.
72|9|aur ye ki ham baithate the us (aakaash) mein sun-gun lene ke sthaanon mein aur jo ab sunane ka prayaas karega, vah paayega apane lie ek ulka ghaat mein laga hua.
72|10|aur ye ki ham nahin samajh paate ki kya kisee buraee ka iraada kiya gaya dharatee vaalon ke saath ya iraada kiya hai, unake saath unake paalanahaar ne seedhee raah par laane ka
72|11|aur hamamen se kuchh sadaachaaree hain aur hamamen se kuchh isake vipareet hain. ham vibhinn prakaaron mein vibhaajit hain.
72|12|tatha hamen vishvaas ho gaya hai ki ham kadaapi vivash nahin kar sakate allaah ko dharatee mein aur na vivash kar sakate hain use bhaagakar.
72|13|tatha jab hamane sunee maargadarshan kee baat, to usapar eemaan le aaye, ab jo bhee eemaan laayega apane paalanahaar par, to nahin bhay hoga use adhikaar hanan ka aur na kisee atyaachaar ka.
72|14|aur ye ki hamamen se kuchh muslim (aagyaakaaree) hain aur kuchh atyaachaaree hain. to jo aagyaakaaree ho gaye, to unhonne khoj lee seedhee raah.
72|15|tatha jo atyaachaaree hain, to ve narak ke eendhan ho gaye.
72|16|aur ye ki yadi ve sthit rahate seedhee raah ( arthaat islaam) par, to ham seenchate unhen bharapoor jal se.
72|17|taaki unakee pareeksha len isamen, aur jo vimukh hoga apane paalanahaar ke smaran (yaad) se, to use usaka paalanahaar grast karega kadee yaatana mein.
72|18|aur ye ki masjiden[1] allaah ke lie hain. atah, mat pukaaro allaah ke saath kisee ko.
72|19|aur ye ki jab khada hua allaah ka bhakt[1] use pukaarata hua, to sameep tha ki ve log usapar pil padate.
72|20|aap kah den ki main to keval apane paalanahaar ko pukaarata hoon aur saajhee nahin banaata usaka kisee any ko.
72|21|aap kah den ki main adhikaar nahin rakhata tumhaare lie kisee haani ka, na seedhee raah par laga dene ka.
72|22|aap kah den ki mujhe kadaapi nahin bacha sakega allaah se koee[1] aur na main pa sakoonga usake siva koee sharanagaar (bachane ka sthaan).

72|23|parantu, pahuncha sakata hoon allaah ka aadesh tatha usaka upadesh aur jo avagya karega allaah tatha usake rasool kee, to vaastav mein usee ke lie narak kee agni hai, jisamen vah nity sadaavaasee hoga.
72|24|yahaan tak ki jab ve dekh lenge, jisaka unhen vachan diya jaata hai, to unhen vishvaas ho jaayega ki kisake sahaayak nirbal aur kisakee sankhya kam hai.
72|25|aap kah den ki main nahin jaanata ki sameep hai, jisaka vachan tumhen diya ja raha hai athaav banaayega mera paalanahaar usake lie koee avadhi
72|26|vah gaib (paroksh) ka gyaanee hai, atah, vah avagat nahin karaata hai apane paroksh par kisee ko.
72|27|sivaaye rasool ke, jise usane priy bana liya hai, phir vah laga deta hai us vahyee ke aage tatha usake peechhe rakshak.
72|28|taaki vah dekh le ki unhonne pahuncha diye hain apane paalanahaar ke upadesh[1] aur usane gher rakha hai, jo kuchh unake paas hai aur pratyek vastu ko gin rakha hai.
